docs.title: WARScribe System Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the WARScribe System documentation — notation, parsing, and transcript reconstruction for the Vindicta Platform.

docs.title: Modules
docs.text:
• WARScribe Core: Core notation models and domain logic.
  • WARScribe Parser: Standalone parser for the Wargame Notation System (WNS).
  • Transcript Toolkit: Tools for battle transcript handling and replay.
